thread.title: J&L Marketing Announces New Regional Vice President of Sales

author: cnbc.com
title: J&L Marketing Announces New Regional Vice President of Sales
text:
LOUISVILLE, Ky.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- J&L Marketing announced today that Kylie Price has been named the new Regional Vice President of Sales. Price will lead the Central and West sales teams at J&L Marketing.
Price has years of experience in the automotive industry and has most recently held the role of Director of Digital Marketing at Affinitiv.
“I’m so excited to be joining the J&L Team as Regional VP of Sales. Really looking forward to bringing J&L’s digital arsenal, and best of breed products to the forefront of our OEM, dealers group, and franchise dealer partners,” Price said.
“We are excited to have Kylie on the J&L Team and although digital marketing is her key strength, she brings a balanced approach to growing the dealer’s business,” said Kirk Cave, Vice President of Sales at J&L Marketing.
For more information about the changes in leadership at J&L Marketing, contact Kirk Cave at KCave@jandlmarketing.com or 800.651.5508.
J&L MARKETING
J&L Marketing is a digital and direct marketing company based in Louisville, KY. The company has specialized in increasing traffic and conversions for the automotive industry since 1991. J&L Marketing has more than 200 employees and representatives throughout the United States. More information is available at www.jandlmarketing.com .
